resources.string:
Purpose of the Game — remove all digits from the field game. 

To remove the digits they must satisfy the conditions described on the following pages. 

If there are any digits left on the board that do not satisfy the conditions, press the "Add new digits" button.
Tap on pair of equal digits or those which add up to ten to remove all the digits from the field.
You can remove digits in adjacent cells both vertically or horizontally:
You can remove digits with blank cells in between:
You can remove last and first digits in adjacent rows:
